Name: Robot-X
About the game: Run jump and shoot through various locations as Robot-X in this platforming shooter. Robot-X is 1 of 26 robots forged for battle, but when they are activated to protect the city, only one awakens: Robot-X. Robot-X must fight off evil and discover what went wrong on this retro journey. have a friend join with a second controller in local co-op as Tin Can! Tin Can is Robot-X's sidekick built from scraps and coffee cans. (Requires 2 controllers) -7-ish Areas Each With Boss Battles! -Over 10 Unique Boss battles -Roughly 30 levels (give or take) -Boss Rush -Challenge Mode, with remixed level designs -Speedrun Timer built in -Simple Plot With Lore challenging but forgiving (and not rage inducing) Platformer-Shooter gameplay. retro Inspired Gameplay! pixel perfect graphics (no halfway overlapping or diagonal pixels here)
